mapper.select: select idx, noticeTitle, noticeDate from(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, M. idx, noticeTitle, noticeDate FROM (select idx as idx,notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_date as noticeDate from notice order by idx desc) M) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select idx as idx,notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_Content as noticeContent,notice_date as noticeDate from notice where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_Content = #{noticeContent} where idx=#{idx}
